name: Potato Curry (Ala Curry)
description: Simple and flavorful potato curry, an everyday Sri Lankan staple
instructions: Heat oil and add mustard seeds
Add curry leaves and onions (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Add potato cubes and mix well
Add water to cover and simmer until potatoes are tender
Add coconut milk and simmer for 5 minutes
cultural_notes: A daily staple in Sri Lankan households, often served with rice and dhal
description_sinhala: සරළ සහ රසවත් අර්තාපල් ව්‍යංජනය, එදිනෙදා ශ්‍රී ලාංකික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය
description_tamil: எளிய மற்றும் சுவையான உருளைக்கிழங்கு கறி, இலங்கையின் அன்றாட உணவாகும்
cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය නිවෙස්වල දෛනික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය, බොහෝ විට බත් සහ පරිප්පු සමඟ සේවය කරයි
cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கை வீடுகளில் தினசரி பிரதான உணவு, பெரும்பாலும் அரிசி மற்றும் பருப்புடன் பரிமாறப்படுகிறது
